description:
The â€œwrite once, run anywhere" mantra holds true when it comes to the development of hybrid, cross-platform apps. Web developers are already using HTML5, CSS and JavaScript so it makes sense to build web and mobile apps with what they know! Hybrid, native-like, mobile app development is gaining momentum for that reason, especially since development costs are significantly reduced.

Develop Your First Hybrid Mobile App

  • get started with one of the most well supported touch-optimized web frameworks jQuery Mobile
  • find out how customizing your app with your own CSS and JavaScript can easily be accomplished
  • create apps with interactive elements such as a quiz which will increase engagement and interest

Enjoy the Benefits of Cross-Platform Development

This course is not an overview but rather a detailed step-by-step guide through the process of developing your first hybrid app. For your convenience, all of the required code snippets and other resources are made available to download. By the end of the course you will have built and compiled your first mobile app ready for the app store.
title: Build a Cross-Platform Mobile App with PhoneGap
